text: Phyllis Logan (born 11 January 1956) is a Scottish actress. She is known for playing Lady Jane Felsham in Lovejoy (1986–1993) and Mrs. Hughes (later Carson) in Downton Abbey (2010–2015). ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Scottish television actors Category:Scottish stage actors Category:Scottish voice actors Category:Actors from Paisley, Renfrewshire
title: Phyllis Logan
